text: I really enjoyed the place really good yummy foods to eat use friendly shopping Mall recommend this place for a nice food nice for take out

Loyang Point is a neighbourhood mall that offers a variety of shops, stalls, fast food, supermarket, food court and service providers etc.

There is also an event space right at the center of the mall. Parking options are available as well.
So many different shops mostly for Eating, under one roof! Only missing shops are a Fried Chicken Store n a Pizza Store. Not too big n over crowded. Makes shopping there easy n convenient.
My favourite place to lepak and groceries shopping. The barbershop over here is the cheapest so far compare to other outlets. Affordable groceries and delicious Rojak shop.

I come here mainly is for washing of laundry. The laundromat here is Uncle  Dhoby. Runs by a male boss.
This place is spacious and clean.
I notice the boss often comes in the morning to maintain the cleanliness of the machines.
He also very helpful with the guidance of use of machine to some new users.

I normally room around at this point while the washing is in progress.
You can spend time having breakfast at McDonald,Burger King , 7-11, marking at 24 hours Giant Supermarket.
Yiu can have Subway for breakfast or brunch .

Here you can find two food courts with the usual menu that you can think of .

Parking is very convenient as itâ€™s have a 4 level of multistory parking space.
